mapper.insert: insert into label (name, creator_id, update_operator_id) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update label set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_operator_id = #{updateOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from label
